message.content: {"id": "6009", "title": "Bug 6009: New class wizard doesn't get context right for nested classes", "description": "When using the new class wizard with a .java file open in the editor and clicking the new class button, the 'Enclosing Type' field is blank instead of defaulting to the current type in the editor.", "OB": "The 'Enclosing Type' field should default to the current type in the editor.", "EB": "The 'Enclosing Type' field is blank.", "SR": "Fix the new class wizard to correctly default the 'Enclosing Type' field to the current type in the editor."}

origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
